author: Bryan Pietsch
title: Citadel partners are donating $5 million of their personal wealth to New York hospitals to advance testing and immunity initiatives
description: Citadel and Citadel Securities partners will donate $5 million to four New York City hospitals as they respond to the coronavirus. The funds will go to Mount Sinai, NYU Langone, The Rockefeller University, and Will Cornell Medicine. The donation will help the…
content: The partners of Citadel and Citadel Securities will donate $5 million of their personal funds to four New York City hospitals to help them advance coronavirus initiatives like testing, immunity, and drug efficacy programs, the hedge fund told Business Insider… [+1570 chars]
